name: Malmbjorn
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 10 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: The Malmbjorn is a massive creature with a grotesque visage, ferocious claws, and a muscular build, covered in a thick hide that contains ferrous metal spikes. It has a huge maw capable of grappling prey and enormous claws that can easily tear through armor.
memorable: Its ability to swallow metal items and bolster its defenses when attacked makes it a formidable and unique foe.
goals: Typically hunts down foes or prey, seeking to ambush with its burrowing abilities.
relations: May coexist with other monsters that share its environment or may prey upon or be preyed upon by smaller creatures.
environment: Often found in rocky terrains or underground, where it can utilize its burrowing abilities.
strengths: Exceptional physical prowess with high strength and durability in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to acid damage, immune to cold damage but only resists nonmagical attacks.
attacks: Can make a fierce bite attack that grapples targets, as well as two slashing attacks with adamantine claws that deal double damage to objects.
most_powerful_ability: Metal Volley can inflict area slashing damage to multiple foes.
senses: It has keen sense of smell, granting it an enhanced ability to detect prey or threats in its vicinity.
skills: It has a basic perception skill, which limits its awareness in certain situations.
additional_information: Can burrow through solid rock, leaving large tunnels.
Ability to pinpoint ferrous metals nearby enhances its hunting capabilities.
Uses Ironhide to temporarily boost its defenses when hit by metal weapons.
Can digest nonmagical metal objects, removing them from opponents.
Low intelligence limits strategic capabilities but compensates with brute strength.
test_queries: predatory rock monster with keen senses
monster immune to cold but weak to acid
